content: half in a jagged line - sew to chest with a very thin space between the pieces with the contrasting floss hat - 5mm hook - in darker color 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 7 increase single_crochet 5 around 42 8 blo - single_crochet around 42 9-18 single_crochet around 10r of 42 19 flo-increase single_crochet 6 around 48 20 increase single_crochet 7 around 54 21 increase single_crochet 8 around 60 slip_stitch into next fo weave in end use contrast color to add stitches around round 8 down one side of the hat over the brim & around the edge of the brim tie off or weave in ends the hat should fit the head well without being to big or too small optional - cut a skull shape out of felt use pen or marker to make eyes & nose then sew to front of hat with the embroidery floss jacket - same color as hat - 5mm hook doc s jacket - this will be made in 4 pieces & sewn together with jacket stitching color body of jacket - 2 pieces 1 chain 21 turn single_crochet 20 2-6 chain 1 turn single_crochet 20 5 row 7 chain 1 turn single_crochet 4 chain 7 skip 7 single_crochet 9 8-18 chain 1 turn single_crochet 20 11 row - fo weave in ends sleeves - make 2 1 chain 19 turn single_crochet 18 2-6 chain 1 turn single_crochet 18 using jacket stitching color sew short ends of sleeves together sew jacket together keeping arms holes in appropriate places sew sleeves to arm holes then whipstitch around all edges put his hat and jacket on and doc is finished
